remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the LayoutEngine class when you want to create custom layout behavior at run time. Derive your own class from the LayoutEngine class and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine.Layout%2A> method to define your custom layout behavior.
